name: VideoGameSuggester
0:
”Alexa, open video game suggester and suggest me a game like Bastion”
”suggest me a game like World of Warcraft”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: video game suggester
des: If you are trying to come up with a game to play, give this skill a shot. Ask it to suggest a game like your favorite game and see if a new favorite comes out! Skill icon is by Delapouite under CC BY 3.0 license.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
